verses.verse: These also are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>; <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>.

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which were <S%H4886>anointed<s%>, whom he <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.

And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and they had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> ministered in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7126>Bring<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5975>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that they may minister unto <S%H8334>him<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: they are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> unto him out of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and they shall wait <S%H8104>on<s%> their <S%H3550>priest<s%>'s office: and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

And <S%H3947>I<s%>, behold, I have taken the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: therefore the Levites shall be <S%H3881>mine<s%>;

Because all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> are <S%H3117>mine<s%>; for on the day that I <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> unto me all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%>: mine shall they <S%H3068>be<s%>: I am the Lord.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6485>Number<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, by their <S%H4940>families<s%>: every <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> shall you number <S%H6485>them<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, as he was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
And these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their <S%H8034>names<s%>; <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, and <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, and <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.
And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; <S%H3845>Libni<s%>, and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; <S%H6019>Amram<s%>, and <S%H3324>Izehar<s%>, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>, and <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>. These <S%H1992>are<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites<s%>, and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8097>Shimites<s%>: these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>.

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>them<s%>, according to the number of all the <S%H2145>males<s%>, from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall be <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3815>Lael<s%>.

And the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> shall be the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H168>tent<s%>, the <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H4539>there<s%>, and the hanging for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>,

And the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, and the <S%H4539>curtain<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, which is by the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H4340>cords<s%> of it for all the service <S%H5656>there<s%>.

And of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6020>Amramites<s%>, and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3325>Izeharites<s%>, and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%>, and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5817>Uzzielites<s%>: these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>.

In the <S%H4557>number<s%> of all the <S%H2145>males<s%>, from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> shall be <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>.

And their <S%H4931>charge<s%> shall be the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H7979>table<s%>, and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> with which they <S%H8334>minister<s%>, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%>, and all the service <S%H5656>there<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H5387>chief<s%> over the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and have the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
Of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites<s%>, and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites<s%>: these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>them<s%>, according to the number of all the <S%H2145>males<s%>, from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was <S%H6700>Zuriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail<s%>: these shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>.

And under the <S%H6486>custody<s%> and <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> shall be the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> <S%H5982>there<s%>, and the pillars <S%H134>there<s%>, and the sockets <S%H3627>there<s%>, and all the vessels <S%H5656>there<s%>, and all the service there,
And the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and their <S%H3489>pins<s%>, and their <S%H4340>cords<s%>.

But those that <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east<s%>, even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, shall be <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

All that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%>, all the <S%H2145>males<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6485>Number<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H2145>males<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, and <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H8034>names<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for <S%H3068>me<s%> (I am the <S%H1060>Lord<s%>) instead of all the firstborn among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1060>him<s%>, all the firstborn among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> by the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%>, from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, of those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H6242>them<s%>, were twenty and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty and <S%H7657>thirteen<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of their <S%H929>cattle<s%>; and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H3068>my<s%>: I am the Lord.

And for those that are to be <S%H6302>redeemed<s%> of the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty and <S%H7657>thirteen<s%> of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which are <S%H5736>more<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>;

You shall even <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> apiece by the <S%H1538>poll<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8255>them<s%>: (the shekel is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>:)
And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%>, with which the odd <S%H5736>number<s%> of them is to be <S%H6302>redeemed<s%>, unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> of them that were <S%H5736>over<s%> and above them that were <S%H6302>redeemed<s%> by the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:

Of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> he the <S%H3701>money<s%>; a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the shekel of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>:

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of them that were <S%H6302>redeemed<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
